wikipedia_page.main: Sir Walter Edward Davidson,  (20 April 1859 – 15 September 1923) was a colonial administrator and diplomat. He served periods as Governor of the Seychelles, Governor of Newfoundland and as Governor of New South Wales, where he died in office.

link_mentions.page: List of governors of Newfoundland and Labrador
